doc.title: Redemption
doc.plot: 1869, the American Civil War has just ended. The last members of a now destitute, aristocratic Southern family journey to California. The scars they carry are deeper and more painful than the loss of their fortune and the only life they've ever known. The war is over, but the battle to heal has just begun, they are in search of a new life, a new fortune, a new world and something else that they do not yet understand, the redemption of their very souls.
